titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Bob Roosth photograph collection, 1967-1971 UA 391
titlestmt.author: Norie Guthrie

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-04-02 13:39:42 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.abstract: This collection consists of photographs, negatives, and proof sheets from Bob Roosth's time as Campanile photographer.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Bob Roosth of Will Rice College graduated in 1971 with a degree in Electrical Engineering. While at Rice University, he took photographs for the Campanile yearbook.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of photographs, negatives, and proof sheets taken by Campanile photographer Bob Roosth. Photographic themes include sports, theater, music performances, art, buildings, construction, and students.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This material is open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish must be obtained from the Woodson Research Center.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Bob Roosth photograph collection, 1967-1971, UA 391, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Images include buildings, student life, construction, nudes, art, and Homecoming 1970.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Images include MOB, professors, football, basketball, student life, baseball, hippies, theater, nudes, and art.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Images include theater, football, track and field, construction, student life, lectures, tennis, life at Will Rice College, faculty, basketball, buildings, and dances and parties.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Images include student life, construction, buildings, dances and parties, Beer Bike, football, art, theater, basketball, faculty, occupation of Allen Center, graduation, and head shots.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Images include theater, student life, Houston, head shots, faculty, Rice computers, football, graduation, and nudes.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Images include football, nudes, dances, head shots, campus, and buildings.
